org.elasticsearch.common.util

接口 ByteArray

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.apache.lucene.util.Accountable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, BigArray, java.io.Closeable, Releasable

    public interface ByteArray
extends BigArray
    Abstraction of an array of byte values.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void fill(long fromIndex, long toIndex, byte value)
      Fill slots between fromIndex inclusive to toIndex exclusive with value.
      byte get(long index)
      Get an element given its index.
      boolean get(long index, int len, org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef ref)
      Get a reference to a slice.
      byte set(long index, byte value)
      Set a value at the given index and return the previous value.
      void set(long index, byte[] buf, int offset, int len)
      Bulk set.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.elasticsearch.common.util.BigArray

        size

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.elasticsearch.common.lease.Releasable

        close

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.lucene.util.Accountable

        getChildResources, ramBytesUsed

    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        Get an element given its index.

      • get

        boolean get(long index,
            int len,
            org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef ref)
        Get a reference to a slice.
        返回:
        true when a byte[] was materialized, false otherwise.
